message.body: Oh lord. I am reading through an old journal and my "1999-kari" just referred to jon berry as "everything i ever wanted" ...i didn't really even know tha
t guy. I wish you were here to share this embarrassment with me.
Haha, Jon berry. We were so dramatic then. The guys that I thought were so important then I don't even remember now. Remember Zed?!?!
Yeah, with his rad blue hair! He's in the journal too. in a particularly heartfelt entry i commiserate with you because he is leaving. I relate it to my
non existent relationship with jon berry...ha! Do you know Jon berry friended me on Facebook? I left it in the queue for so long 'cause i was embarrassed
. Finally accepted. i think he's "liked" a few of my photos. geez. Hey, how was Lancaster xmas??
Thankfully we managed to end up fairly well adjusted! We're both happy and kind of normal. :-)
Will you be coming back up any time soon?
